title: Ethereum Foundation Forms AI Research Team to Blend Blockchain, AI
description: The Ethereum Foundation is starting a new team focused on artificial intelligence, as the blockchain's role as a settlement layer grows.
content:
The Ethereum Foundation announced a new AI-focused research team, aiming to blend the censorship-resistant power of blockchain with one of tech’s hottest fields.

title: Expert committee constituted for exploring the use of Artificial Intelligence in healthcare, says T.N. Health Minister Ma. Subramanian
description: Tamil Nadu forms expert committee to explore AI in healthcare, focusing on early detection of cancer and tuberculosis.
content:
An expert committee to look into Artificial Intelligence (AI) in healthcare has been constituted in Tamil Nadu. It will explore the use of AI in the health sector and submit a report, according to Health Minister Ma. Subramanian.
The Tamil Nadu Medic... [3048 chars]

title: Alphabet becomes $3 trillion company, joins Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia in elite trillion club
description: Alphabet has officially crossed into the $3 trillion club, cementing its place alongside Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia as one of the world’s most valuable companies. The milestone was reached on Monday after shares surged on renewed optimism around artificial intelligence and a favorable antitrust ruling that lifted a cloud hanging over Google’s parent company. title: Finding your perfect match: The HP AI PC lineup made simple for consumers
description: Artificial intelligence has officially passed “buzzword” status as it continues transforming the way we work and create. title: Blackstone to buy Pennsylvania power plant
description: Blackstone said on Monday it has agreed to buy a natural gas plant in Western Pennsylvania for nearly $1 billion, as the investment firm bets on rising U.S. electricity demand to power artificial intelligence technologies.
